N. hen's egg M: ge / ²zhī / ⁴méi / 個 / 隻 / 枚
N. cow's milk 我睡前喝一杯牛奶。 Wǒ shuì qián hē yī̠ bēi niúnǎi. I drink a glass of milk before going to sleep. M: bēi / 杯

INTJ. How are you?; Hello.
F.E. Good-bye.; See you again.

PR. you 你幹你的, 我幹我的。 Nǐ gàn nǐ de, wǒ gàn wǒ de. You work in your way and I'll work in mine.

PR. 1 he 2 she 3 it 4 they (referring to inanimate things in object position) 梨都爛了, 最好把他扔了。 Lí dōu làn le, zuìhǎo bǎ tā rēng le. The pears have all spoiled; better throw them away. B.F. other; another in qítā , tārén , tāchù
PR. she (neologism for ¹tā)

V. 1 be 2 wr. praise; justify B.F. matter; affair 國是 guóshì national affairs PR. this; all S.V. right; true ADV. certainly; for sure 天氣是熱。 Tiānqì shì rè. It sure is hot. CONS. A ∼ A it's A all right, but ... 好是好, 可是我不喜歡。 Hǎo shì hǎo, kěshì wǒ bù xǐhuan. It's good all right, but I don't like it.
P.W. 1 China 2 Middle Kingdom
P.W. United States

ADV. 1 not 2 no CONS. 1 ∼ A ∼ B (where A B are paired synonyms) not A B 不慌不忙 Bùhuāngbùmáng unhurried 2 ∼ A ∼ B (where A B are antonymous stative verbs) neither A nor B 不大不小 bụ̀dàbùxiǎo neither (too) big nor (too) small 3 ∼ A ∼ B (where A B are antonymous verbs) no B without A 不破不立 bụ̀pòbụ̀lì no constructing without destroying 4 ∼ A ér B do B without doing A 不戰而勝 bụ̀zhàn'érshèng win without fighting 5 A ∼ A (the matter/question of) A or not A 博士不博士, 我無所謂。 bóshì bù bóshì, wǒ wúsuǒwèi. Whether or not I get a PhD makes no difference to me. 6 V1 ∼ V1V2 (variant form of V1V2 ∼ V1V2, where V1V2 is a compound verb) whether or not V1V2 可不可能? kě bù kěnéng? Is it possible that ...? PREF. non-; un-
N. person; people B.F. human 這是人幹的嗎? Zhè shì rén gàn de ma? Was this done by a human being? in rénkǒu , réngé
N. dog M: tiáo / 條 B.F. damned; cursed in gǒubèi
SUF. plural for pronouns and human nouns

V. 1 love 你愛她嗎? Nǐ ài tā ma? Do you love her? 2 like; be fond of; be keen on 他愛說話。 Tā ài shuōhuà. He likes to talk. 我不愛吃豬肉。 Wǒ bù ài chī zhūròu. I don't like to eat pork. 3 cherish 4 be apt to N. love M: zhǒng / ²chǎng / 種 / 場 CONS. 1 ∼ V bù V V or not as you please 你愛來不來。 Nǐ ài lái bù lái. I don't care if you come or not. 2 ∼ A ³shèng B hold A dearer than B 愛人勝己 Ài rén shèng jǐ love others more than oneself
ADV. 1 all 大家都來了 。 Dàjiā dōu lái le. Everyone has arrived. 2 even 3 already See also ²dū
N. elder brother M: ge / ²wèi / 個 / 位
N. elder sister
N. younger brother
N. younger sister

V. 1 have; possess 2 be; exist CONS. 1 ∼ A ∼ B both A and B 有說有笑 Yǒu shuō yǒu xiào talking and laughing 2 ∼ A wú B have A but not B 有增無減 Yǒu zēng wú jiǎn increase but not decrease 3 ∼ N kě V there is N which (one) can/may V 有飯可吃 Yǒu fàn kě chī have food to eat PREF. (before names of dynasties) wr. 有夏 Yǒu Xià the Xia dynasty See also ⁹yòu
V. not have; there is not; be without ADV. less than; not more than 我沒有你高。 Wǒ méiyǒu nǐ gāo. I'm not as tall as you.

S.P. 1 (of subordination) 我買的書 wọ̌ mǎi de shū the book I bought 2 (noun-forming, like English -er) 看門的 kānmén de doorkeeper CONS. (shì) A ∼ action emphasizing A 我是昨天買的。 Wǒ shì zuótiān mǎi de. It was yesterday that I bought it. 我想(是)不會下雨的。 Wọ̌ xiǎng (shì) bụ̀ huì xiàyǔ de. I think it's unlikely to rain. CONS. 1 coll. by 這間屋子是五米的六米, 合三十平方米。 Zhè jiān wūzi shì wụ̌ mǐ de liù mǐ, hé sānshí píngfāng mǐ. This room is 5 x 6 meters, or 30 square meters. 2 topo. plus 五個的六個, 一共十一個。 Wǔ ge de liù ge, yị̄gòng shíyī ge. Five plus six is eleven. See also d ⁴dī ⁶dí ⁶dì
N. panda M: ²zhī / 隻
N. pig; hog; swine B.F. a symbol of man's stupidity in chǔnzhū
PR. this ADV. now See also zhèi
PR. that CONJ. then; in that case 那我們就不能去了。 Nà wǒmen jiù bùnéng qù le. In that case we just can't go. See also nǎ ²nèi ⁴nuó ⁶nuò

ADV. 1 also; too; as well; either 2 even 我想也沒想到。 Wǒ xiạ̌ng yě méi xiǎngdào. I didn't even think of it. 3 more or less; by and large 他的中文也還可以。 Tā de Zhōngwén yě hái kẹ̌yǐ. His Chinese is passable. CONS. 1 (suīrán/jíshǐ) V1 ∼ V2 (even) if V1 nevertheless V2 a 我少吃一頓也無所謂。 Wọ̌ shǎo chī yị̄ dùn yě wúsuǒwèi. I don't mind skipping a meal. b 即使她沒說, 我也知道。 Jíshǐ ²tā méi shuō, wọ̌ yě zhīdao. Even if she hadn't mentioned it, I would have known. 2 ∼ A ∼ B be both A and B M.P. , wr. (used in classical language at the end of a sentence or clause) 是可忍也, 孰不可忍也。 Shì kẹ̌ rěn yě, ³shú bù kẹ̌ rěn yě. If this can be tolerated, what cannot? 人之過也, 各於其黨。 Rén zhī guò yě, gè yú qí dǎng. People's faults are characteristic of the classes to which they belong.
N. 1 cow; ox; cattle 2 Surname B.F. , coll. talk big; boast; brag in chuīniú S.V. (slang) arrogant See also ³niū
N. 1 sheep 2 Surname
M.P. (calling for agreement or disagreement) 你信他嗎? Nǐ xìn tā ma? Do you believe him? See also ¹má ⁵mǎ
N. 1 fish 2 Surname

N. beef 這牛肉餡兒包子特別好吃。 Zhè niúròu ⁷xiànr bāozi tèbié hǎochī. The steamed beef bun is especially tasty.
N. bread M: ge / ²zhī / 個 / 隻

V. 1 eat 2 eat in/at 吃飯館 Chī fànguǎn eat at a restaurant 3 have a meal 你吃了嗎? Nǐ chī le ma? Have you eaten? 4 live on 這碗飯可不容易吃。 Zhè wǎn fàn kě bù róngyì chī. This is a hard way to earn a living. 5 annihilate; wipe out 6 take a piece (in chess) 炮吃馬。 Pào chī mǎ. The cannon takes the horse (in chess). 7 drink in chīshuǐ , chīchá , chījiǔ 8 absorb; soak up 9 suffer; incur 10 exhaust; be a strain 11 stutter; stammer; speak indistinctly in kǒuchī , jiǎnchī See also ¹⁷qī

B.F. 1 gentle; mild; moderate in wēnhé 2 harmonious; on friendly terms in ¹tiáohé COV. (together) with N. 1 sum 2 peace 3 (sport) draw; tie 這盤棋和了。 Zhè pán ⁶qí hé le. This game of chess ended in a draw. 4 Japan 5 Surname V. (sport) tie CONJ. and See also ⁵hē ³hè ¹⁰hú ⁷huō ²huó ⁷huò

N. , loan coffee
N. wine; liquor; spirits
N. fruit juice M: bēi / 杯
N. , loan cola S.V. laughable; funny; amusing
V. 1 drink 他喜歡喝咖啡。 Tā xǐhuan hē kāfēi. He likes drinking coffee. 2 shout (a command) See also ¹hè
V. 1 like; love; be fond of 2 be happy/elated/delighted 接到你的來信我好不喜歡。 Jiēdào nǐ de láixìn wọ̌ hǎobù xǐhuan. I was extremely delighted to hear from you.

V. 1 cry; shout 2 call; greet 3 hire; order 4 name; call 我叫張琳。 Wǒ jiào Zhāng Lín. My name is Lin Zhang. 5 cause; make a 風能叫船走。 Fēng néng jiào chuán zǒu. The wind can make the ship go. b 主任叫他去開會。 Zhǔrèn jiào tā qù kāihuì. The director wants him to go to the meeting. PREF. , topo. male (of certain farm animals) in jiàolǘ , jiàojī COV. by (in passive cons.) 我叫他打了。 Wǒ jiào tā dǎ le. I was beaten by him.

PR. 1 what? 你在說什麼? Nǐ zài shuō shénme? What are you talking about? 2 something; anything CONS. 1 ∼ (A) yě/dōu any/every A 他什麼都不要。 Tā shénme dōu bụ̀yào. He doesn't want anything. 2 V1 ∼ V2 ∼ V2 whatever V1 有什麼吃什麼。 Yǒu shénme chī shénme. Eat whatever there is.
who; which person
PR. which; what; how See also na ¹nà Né ¹něi ²nèi ⁴nuó ⁶nuò
N. 1 country; state; nation 2 Surname B.F. 1 of the state; national in guóqí 2 of our country; Chinese in guóhuà

NUM. 1 one; 1 2 once 可一不可二。 kě yī bùkě èr. Once is forgivable, not twice. B.F. 1 each; per 一桌八人 Yī zhuō bā rén eight people per table 2 whole; all; throughout 我一天都不在家。 Wǒ yī tiān dōu bụ̀ zài jiā. I won't be at home all day. 3 single; alone 4 same 意見不一 yìjian bù yī opinions differ ADV. 1 as soon as 天氣一冷 tiānqì yī lěng as soon as the weather turns cold 2 a little 看一看 kànyīkàn take a look 3 “empty” adverb in four-syllable expressions 為之一振 wèizhīyīzhèn be buoyed up by it 4 also; otherwise 一名 Yī míng be also known as CONS. 1 ∼ A jiù B as soon as A (then) B 2 ∼ A èr B a very AB, where AB is a two-syllable s.v. 一清二靜 Yī qīng èr jìng absolutely quiet b one or two AB, where AB is a noun 一差二錯 Yī chà èr cuò one or two mistakes 3 ∼ A bàn A/B a little of A and of A or B, where A and B are identical or similar in meaning 這個工程可不是一天半天能完的。 Zhège gōngchéng kě bụ̀ shì yī tiān bàn tiān néng wán de. This project can't be finished in a short time. 4 ∼ V1 ér V2 V2 immediately after V1 一怒而去 Yīnù'érqù flare up and leave 5 ∼ N (yě) bù/méi V not V even one N; without omitting a single N 一字不漏 Yīzìbụ̀lòu without omitting a single character 6 V ∼ VM V a VM 咬一口 yǎo yī kǒu take a bite 7 ∼ V1 bù V2 inalterably V1 一去不返 Yī qù bù fǎn gone never to return 8 ∼ N1 ∼ N2 a all or the whole of N1/N2 一生一世 Yīshēngyīshì all one's life b each/every N1/N2 一言一行 Yīyányīxíng every word and deed 9 ∼ V1 ∼ V2 a do V1/V2 in succession (where V1/V2 are similar in meaning) 一蹦一跳 Yībèngyītiào skip and jump b do V1/V2 alternately (where V1/V2 contrast in meaning) 一問一答 Yīwènyīdá one asks and the other answers 10 ∼ A ∼ B one A, one B (where A/B are opposite in meaning) 一東一西 Yī dōng yī xī one east, one west ∼ V ²zài V keep on doing V 一錯再錯 Yīcuòzàicuò keep on making mistakes N. a note of the scale in gōngchěpǔ

NUM. 1 two; 2 2 both (sides); either (side) 3 a few; some M. 1 ounce 2 tael

NUM. six; 6
NUM. seven; 7 B.F. each of seven seventh-day memorials after a death 二七 èr qī second seventh-day memorial CONS. ∼ A bā B topsy-turvy AB 七上八下 Qīshàngbāxià confused 七大八小 Qīdàbāxiǎo of unequal size
NUM. eight; 8
NUM. nine; 9 B.F. many; numerous in sānwānjiǔzhuàn
NUM. ten; 10 B.F. complete in ¹shífēn , ¹shízú
NUM. 1 how many? 2 a few; several; some See also ¹⁶jī ¹⁷jī
M. (for animals, vessels, some utensils, one of a pair of things) B.F. single in zhīzìwèití See also ¹zhǐ

noun 1 literary year 嵗除 suìchú New Year’s Eve 嵗杪 suìmiǎo end of the year; year-end 嵗末 suìmò end of the year 嵗時 suìshí four seasons 嵗朝 suìzhāo first day of the lunar New Year 辭舊嵗, 迎新年 cí jiù suì, yíng xīnnián ring out the old year and ring in the new 2 literary year's harvest 歉嵗 qiànsuì lean year 3 age 同嵗 tóngsuì of the same age 4 literary time 嵗月如梭。 suì yuè rúsuō. How time flies. measure word year (of age) 三嵗女孩兒 sān suì nǚ hái'ér three-year-old girl

N. cat M: ²zhī / 隻 V. , topo. hide away 他整天貓在屋子裡。 Tā zhěngtiān māo zài wūzi lǐ. He stays in his room all day. See also ⁸máo
F.E. how many/much 多少錢一個? Duōshao qián yị̄ gè? How much is it for one? See also duōshǎo

V. | AUX. want/wish (to); ask (for) AUX. shall; will; be about to B.F. 1 must; should; need to in ²xūyào 2 important; essential; vital in zhòngyào , yàojǐn 3 wr. summarize; outline in gàiyào CONJ. if; suppose; in case CONS. gēn A ∼ B ask A for B 跟他要錢 gēn tā yào qián ask him for money See also ³yāo

V. give; give to COV. 1 for; for the benefit of 給他寫信 Gěi tā xiěxìn write a letter for/to him 2 by (in passive cons.) 他給人打了。 Tā gěi rén dǎ le. He was beaten by people. SUF. to 把信遞給他。 Bǎ xìn dìgěi tā. Hand the letter over to him. CONS. 1 ∼ A yǐ B give B to A 2 ∼ wǒ V do V (strong, often angry, command) 給我住嘴! Gěi wǒ zhùzuǐ! Shut up! See also ⁵jǐ
V. 1 request; ask (a favor) 請他進來。 Qǐng tā jìnlai. Ask him in. 2 engage; hire (teacher/etc.) 3 Please ...

P.W. school; educational institution 學校明天放假。 Xuéxiào míngtiān fàngjià. There will be no school tomorrow. M: jiā / suǒ / ge / 家 / 所 / 個

V. 1 go; go to; leave; depart 2 get rid of; remove; cast out 去你的! Qù nǐ de! Get lost! 3 dispatch 給教授去個電話問問。 Gěi jiàoshòu qù ge diànhuà wènwen. Give the professor a ring and ask about it. 4 be apart 相去不遠 xiāngqùbùyuǎn not far from each other 5 (opera) play the role of CONS. in order to 掙錢去養家 zhèngqián qù yǎngjiā earn money to support one's family SUF. away 送去 sòngqù send away B.F. 1 past; last in qùnián 2 “going” tone; Mandarin fourth tone in qùshēng ADV. , topo. extremely; really; quite 可好了去了! Kẹ̌ hǎole qù le! It's really good!

P.W. 1 where? 2 how could it be possible? 哪裡有這樣的事兒? Nạ̌li yǒu zhèyàng de shìr? How could this have happened? 3 wherever; where F.E. polite rejection of compliment 您唱得真好。…哪裡, 哪裡。 Nín chàng de zhēn hǎo. ... Nạ̌li, nạ̌li. You sing very well. ... You flatter me.
N. 1 week 他走了一個星期了。 Tā zǒule yị̄ ge xīngqī le. He's been gone for one week. 2 Sunday
N. Sunday 星期天去爬山, 好嗎? Xīngqītiān qù páshān, hǎo ma? How about going mountain climbing on Sunday?

M. year B.F. 1 age in niánlíng 2 New Year in ¹niángāo 3 a period in one's life in ¹zhōngnián 4 a period in history in mònián 5 harvest in niáncheng N. 1 age 他年近六十。 Tā nián jìn liùshí. He's close to 60 years old. 2 Surname

SUF. 1 number in a series 五號 wǔ hào number five 2 date 一月三號 Yị̄yuè sān hào January third B.F. 1 size in dàhào 2 arrange in a series in biānhào 3 shop; firm; business in ¹shānghào 4 mark in biāohào 5 name; appellation in guóhào N. 1 assumed name; sobriquet 2 brass wind instrument V. 1 make a mark 2 feel the pulse M. (for number of people) 一百多號人 yī̠bǎi duō hào rén over a hundred people See also ⁴háo
N. month B.F. 1 moon in yuèliang 2 monthly in yuèkān , ¹yuèxīn
NUM. 1 zero 2 naught; nil B.F. 1 odd; a little extra in língtóu 2 fractional; part in língshù 3 small change in ¹língqián 4 (mechanical) part in ¹língjiàn 5 wither and fall in ¹língluò See also līng
PR. 1 this one; this 這個人真好。 Zhège rén zhēn hǎo. This person is nice. 2 coll. so; such INTJ. hesitation marker (e.g., hem/hum/etc.) See also zhèige
1 first (of two parts) 2 last (week etc) 3 previous 4 the above
N. birthday 十月三號是我的生日。 Shíyuè sān hào shì wǒ de shēngri. My birthday is October 3.
N. 1 now; at present; today 現在幾點了?。 Xiànzài jị̌ diǎn le?. What time is it now? 2 modern times; nowadays ATTR. modern

N. 1 a drop (of liquid) 2 a spot 3 dot stroke (in Chinese characters) 4 dot; decimal point; point 三十點五 sānshí diǎn wǔ thirty point five (30.5) 5 place 6 aspect; feature 7 appointed time 8 refreshments 9 lg. node; peak; point M. 1 (for small amounts) 給我點錢。 Gẹ̌i wǒ diǎn qián. Give me a little money. 2 (of time) 三點 sān diǎn three o'clock 3 (for items/matters) 我要說的有兩點。 Wǒ yào shuō de yọ̌u liǎng diǎn. There are two points I want to talk about. 4 (printer's point size) 四號字等於十四點。 Sì hào zì děngyú shísì diǎn. No. 4 type is equivalent to 14 points. V. 1 put (a dot) 2 drip 3 sow in holes 4 check one by one 5 select; choose 6 hint; point out; mention 只要一點, 她就明白了。 Zhǐyào yī̠ diǎn, ²tā jiù míngbai le. You only have to mention it, and she'll understand. 7 light; burn; kindle 8 touch on briefly; skim 老師點了這事。 Lǎoshī diǎnle zhè shì. The teacher touched on the matter. CONS. V-zhe ∼ polite command/reminder to V 過馬路時看著點。 Guò mǎlù ²shí kànzhe diǎn. Watch out when you cross the street.

V. 1 divide; separate 2 distribute; allot 3 distinguish; differentiate; discriminate M. (for units of length/area/weight/money/time/etc.) 1 fraction 2 one-tenth 3 percent 4 (slang) ten yuán (RMB) 5 point 我考試考了一百分。 Wọ̌ kǎoshì kǎole yī̠bǎi fēn. I got 100 on the exam. B.F. 1 part in bùfen 2 branch (office, etc.) in fēnjú See also ³fèn
N. morning SUF. earlier 十年早上 shí nián zǎoshang 10 years earlier
N. morning; forenoon
N. noon; midday
N. afternoon

V. 1 be at/in/on 請問, 老王在嗎? Qǐngwèn, Lǎo Wáng zài ma? Excuse me, is Old Wang there/here? 2 exist; live 我爸爸已經不在了。 Wǒ bàba yǐjing bụ̀zài le. My father has passed away. 3 depend on; rest with ADV. CONS. 1 ∼ A suǒyǐ B because A therefore B 因為天快黑了, 所以我要走了。 Yīnwèi tiān kuài hēi le, suọ̌yǐ wǒ yào zǒu le. It's about to get dark, so I'd better take my leave. 2 ∼ A de guānxi because of A 3 ∼ A ér V to V because of A

COV. 1 except 除了電腦, 他對什麼都不感興趣。 Chúle diànnǎo, tā duì shénme dōu bù gǎn xìngqù. Apart from computers, he's not interested in anything. 2 besides CONS. 1 ∼ A yǐwài apart from A; except for A 2 ∼ A yǐwài, hái B in addition to A, also B

V. 1 yield 他不讓人。 Tā bụ̀ ràng rén. He does not yield to others. 2 allow 媽媽不讓我去。 Māma bụ̀ ràng wǒ qù. My mom won't let me go. 3 induce sb. to do sth. a 誰讓你來的? Shuí ràng nǐ lái de? Who told you to come? b 她讓客人就座。 ²Tā ràng kèren jiùzuò. She invited guests to sit at table. 4 transfer possession of sth. 5 offer COV. (passive signifier) by 行李讓雨給淋濕了。 Xíngli ràng yụ̌ gěi línshī le. Generally 沒 or 沒有 are for past tense verbs and 不 is for present tense, future tense, or habitual.
You can never use 不 with 有.
To clarify that a verb is complete. - Examples: 還沒有做好了 - I haven't completed it yet 這本書我看好了 - I have finished reading this book 飯做好了 - The meal is ready 準備好了嗎？ - Finished getting ready?

To emphasize the time, location, or person involved in something that already happened. - Examples: 你是什麼時候到的？- What time did you arrive (emphasis on time of arrival) 這個三明治你什麼時候做的？ - When did you make this? (emphasis on the person) 這是我媽媽送給我的。- My mom gave it to me. (emphasis on your mom) 這是誰幹的？ Who did that? (emphasis on the person) 這不是我說的 It wasn't me who said that. (emphasis on the person)
